soen6441riskgame.controllers

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441riskgame.controllers.MapController

  • public final class MapController
extends Object
    handle the operations to generate, edit and control the map.

    • Method Detail

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent(String continentName,
                         String continentValue,
                         int... order)
        adds new continent
        Parameters:
        continentName - name of the continent
        continentValue - the amount of army for the new continent
        order - the continent other in the list (start with 1 as the map file structure indicate)

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(String countryName,
                       String continentName)
        add new country to an existed continent OR add existing country to an existed continent
        Parameters:
        countryName - the new country name
        continentName - the existed continent name

      • addNeighbor

        public void addNeighbor(String countryName,
                        String neighborCountryName)
        connect 2 countries with each other on the borderGraph
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country
        neighborCountryName - name of the neighbor country

      • createNewCountry

        public void createNewCountry(String countryName,
                             Continent continent)
        create new country, add it to the borderGraph
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country
        continent - the name of continent that country belong to

      • editContinent

        public void editContinent(String[] args)
        handle 'editcontient' command from console
        Parameters:
        args - -add continentName continentValue -remove continentName

      • editCountry

        public void editCountry(String[] args)
        handle 'editcountry' command
        Parameters:
        args - -add countryName continentName -remove countryName

      • editMap

        public void editMap(String fileName)
             throws IOException
        edit an existing map from file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the map file
        Throws:
        IOException - exception

      • editNeighbor

        public void editNeighbor(String[] args)
        handle 'editneighbor' command
        Parameters:
        args - -add countryName neighborCountryName -remove countryName neighborCountryName

      • getContinentFromName

        public Continent getContinentFromName(String continentName)
        get continent object from name
        Parameters:
        continentName - name of the continent
        Returns:
        null if continent name is not existed in map

      • isContinentExisted

        public boolean isContinentExisted(String continentName)
        check if continent with the specified name existed in map
        Parameters:
        continentName - name of the continent
        Returns:
        is continent existed

      • isCountryExisted

        public boolean isCountryExisted(String countryName)
        check if country with the specified name existed in map
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country
        Returns:
        true if country existed

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap(String fileName)
             throws IOException
        load map from file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the exact path to map file, end with .map extension for example: D://src/test/java/soen6441riskgame/maps/RiskEurope.map
        Throws:
        IOException - exception

      • removeContinent

        public void removeContinent(String continentName)
        Remove a continent from map. Remove continent will make all country inside that continent invalid, thus make the map invalid.
        Parameters:
        continentName - name of the continent

      • removeCountry

        public void removeCountry(String countryName)
        remove a country from map, this including remove it border info and remove it from continent
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country to remove

      • removeNeighbor

        public void removeNeighbor(String countryName,
                           String neighborCountryName)
        remove connection between 2 countries in the borderGraph
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country
        neighborCountryName - name of the neighbor country

      • resetMap

        public void resetMap()
        Reset the map, clear all continents, countries and borders

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap(String fileName)
             throws IOException
        save the map to a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - path to file
        Throws:
        IOException - exception

      • showMap

        public void showMap()
        Display all continents and it's countries to console

      • isMapValid

        public boolean isMapValid()
        validate the map Types of errors: 1. less than 6 countries 2. some countries are isolated from the rest 3. empty continents 4. one country is linked to another but no link back There is no need to check for the last one, because not happened in our implementation
        Returns:
        is map valid or not

      • validateMap

        public void validateMap()
        handle the map validation command
